ygData.subject: Re: Erudite Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the wizard is powerful, but in a unique way.  Wizards at higher levels nuke things.  Pure and simply DD that surpasses anything else.  They also get the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the wizard is powerful, but in a unique way. Wizards at higher levels
nuke things. Pure and simply DD that surpasses anything else. They also
get the best traveling spells. Also good AOE (I think the best). In
exchange they have few utility type spells, nothing in the way of buffs for
others (nothing to speak of, anyway,) and no pets.
-----Original Message-----
From: Billy Sun <bsun@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 16, 1999 1:27 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Erudite Quests


>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>

>classes?
>
>Maestra
